General.Name: Gulf Alternative Energy Corp
General.Description: Gulf Alternative Energy Corp. processes biomass, such as sorghum or switch grass, into a fine powder and produces ethanol. The company was formerly known as Gulf Ethanol Corp. and changed its name to Gulf Alternative Energy Corp. in March 2009. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 1240 Blalock Road, Houston, TX, United States, 77055
